text: sillo geudaedeul-eul wihan jingpyoga majdagtteulin du mulie iss-eoss-euni han mulineun hananim-ui gil-eseo ssaumyeo daleun mulineun bulsinjadeul-ila. geudeul(midneun jadeul)i moggyeoghani geudeul(bulsinjadeul)eul jasindeul-ui du baelo bodeola. hananimkkeseoneun geubun-ui doum-eulosseo geubunkkeseo wonhasineun jaleul dowajusinola. jinsillo geu an-eneun sigag-eul jinin jadeul-eul wihan gyohun-i issnola
